title: Mini Series - State v. Jonathan Irons – Addendum 1 – Show Me
description:
June 18, 2020 / Jonathan Irons's attorneys Kent Gipson and Taylor RIckard discuss the first 2 episodes of the series with Colin Miller and host Rebecca Lavoie.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

This episode was sponsored by Betterhelp.
